location: 2702 Roxas Boulevard, Pasay, 1300 Manila, Philippines
description: Along Roxas Boulevard providing views of the famous Manila Bay, Midas Hotel features 2 dining options, a casino and contemporary rooms with a private balcony. It has a business center and offers free Wi-Fi access in the entire property. The hotel provides free scheduled shuttle service to the famous SM Mall of Asia, which is just over 1.6 km away. The World Trade Center and Cultural Center of the Philippines are 4 km away, and Ninoy Aquino International Airport is accessible with a 4.8 km drive. Elegantly furnished, rooms are well-equipped with an in-room safe, a flat-screen cable TV, fridge and comfortable sitting area. Tea/coffee making facilities and minibar are also included. The private bathroom features a bathtub, bathrobes and a 3-way combination shower. Available 24/7, the front desk staff at Midas Hotel and Casino can assist guests with luggage storage and concierge services. Guests can use the fitness center, or enjoy a pampering massage at the spa. Free parking is also provided for guests who drive. The in-house Midas CafÃ© serves local buffet dining throughout the day. Authentic Japanese cuisine is also available at Yanagi Restaurant.

description: Located in Pasay City, Sofitel Philippine Plaza Manila offers rooms with private balconies and views of Manila Bay. It features an outdoor pool, a spa, various restaurants and bars. It is less than 1.2 mi away from the Mall of Asia. It is located about 4.3 mi away from Manila International Airport and a 30-minute drive from Makati City.

location: Meralco Avenue & Sapphire Street, Ortigas Center, Pasig, 1600 Manila, Philippines
description: Located in the heart of Manilaâ€™s city center, Marco Polo Ortigas Manila features luxurious rooms with spectacular views. Featuring 3 dining options, this 5-star hotel also has an indoor pool and free Wi-Fi access. Marco Polo Ortigas Manila is less than 0.6 mi from popular attractions including The Podium and Metrowalk. The property also offers a 24-hour reception and airport shuttle services. The hotelâ€™s signature Continental Club offers exclusive privileges. A variety of dining options, including a Chinese restaurant and a lobby lounge will serve fresh meals daily. Guests can also enjoy a cocktail at the stylish Sky Bar.

It offers contemporary rooms and features an exclusive Pillow Menu to suit guestsâ€™ preferences. Free Wi-Fi access is available in the entire hotel. Ninoy Aquino International Airport can be reached with a 30-minute drive. Offering views of the city, air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a personal safe, a flat-screen cable TV, a mini-bar and ironing facilities. En suite marble bathrooms include a hairdryer, bathrobes, bathtub or shower facility and free bath amenities. At Fairmont Makati, the 24-hour front desk can assist with luggage storage, currency exchange and laundry services. Guests can also approach the tour desk for sightseeing and travel arrangements. Massage packages are provided at the spa. The in-house restaurant, Spectrum, serves a wide selection of international cuisines, while CafÃ© Macaron offers tasty pastries. Guests may also enjoy meals at the comfort of their beds.

location: 1 Aseana Avenue, Entertainment City, Paranaque, 1300 Manila, Philippines
description: Set against the scenic backdrop of Manila Bay and a 5-minute drive from SM Mall of Asia, Solaire Resort & Casino features an outdoor pool, a spa, and 17 dining options giving guests the benefit of satisfying their palete's cravings. The property also features of the state-of-the-art lyric theater that showcase world-class entertainment. The elegant rooms feature floor to ceiling windows that afford guests exquisite sunset views. Highlighting a 350 thread count bed linen, a flat-screen TV and an private bathroom that has a bathtub and a separate walk-in shower, the rooms at Solaire Resort & Casino offer guests the comforts of an urban escape. Among the several dining options, Red Lantern serves traditional Cantonese cuisine while Japanese delicacies can be enjoyed at Yakumi. At Finestra, guests may savor on their favorite Italian dishes that is paired with their choice of wine. For guests opting for casual dining, Oasis and Waterside Restobar offer International dishes and are headed by world-renowned chefs. This integrated resort offers 18,500 sqm casino with over 1200 slot machines and 300 table games. Guests can take pleasure lounging in an outdoor themed casino, an entertainment bar, and VIP salons. Concierge service is also available. Solaire Resort & Casino is a 5-minute drive from Mall of Asia Arena and 1 mi from SMX Convention Center. The nearest airport is  Ninoy Aquino International Airport, 3.4 mi away from the property.

hotel_name_: Novotel Manila Araneta City Hotel - Multiple Use and Staycation Approved
location: General Aguinaldo Avenue, Araneta City, Cubao, Quezon City, 0810 Manila, Philippines
description: Located within the business district of Quezon City, Novotel Manila Araneta City offers contemporary accommodations with easy access to LRT/MRT Stations, Gateway Mall and Smart Araneta Center. It features an outdoor pool, all-day dining restaurant, a grand ballroom and 7 meeting rooms. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. A lounge and on-site bar is also available. Smart Araneta Coliseum is a few steps from Novotel Manila Araneta City, while Bonifacio High Street is 5 mi from the property. The nearest airport is Ninoy Aquino Airport, 8.7 mi from the property.

location: Ayala Centre, Makati, 1223 Manila, Philippines
description: Just 200 m from Ayala MRT, Dusit Thani Manila offers luxurious rooms and several specialty restaurants. Dusit Thani also has an outdoor pool and a fitness center. The rooms at Dusit Thani Manila are equipped with LCD TVs with satellite channels, a work desk, and air conditioning. Some of the rooms have Executive Club lounge access, which offers complimentary drinks and snacks. Their on-site restaurant, The Pantry, serves organic and locally sourced fare that feature a unique blend of Indian, Italian and Pan-Asian cuisine.

hotel_name_: Diamond Hotel Philippines - Multiple Use Hotel
location: Dr. J. Quintos cor. Roxas Blvd Malate, 1000 Manila, Philippines
description: Right on Manila Bay, a 30 minute drive from Ninoy Aquino International Airport, the 5-star Diamond Hotel Philippines features a spectacular free-form pool, tennis courts and a spa with reflexology treatments. The air-conditioned rooms are bright with large windows and spacious interiors. They have cable TV, a minibar and a sitting area with sofa set. Selected rooms offer great views of the bay. Luxurious massages and body treatments await guests at the spa. They can also work out at Diamond Hotelâ€™s well-equipped fitness center or relax at the outdoor hot tub. Enjoy views of a tropical grounds with delicate Japanese dishes at the award-winning Yurakuen Japanese Restaurant. Corniche Restaurant provides an international menu, while the Sky Lounge Music Bar offers a variety of beverages. Room service is available. The Diamond Philippines is a 10 minute drive from Luneta Park and a 20 minute drive from the Mall of Asia. Car rental facilities are available at the hotel.

description: Located in the Makati district in Manila, 701 m from Power Plant Mall, I'M Hotel features a spa center and hot tub. The hotel has a sauna and fitness center, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a TV. Rooms have a private bathroom equipped with a bidet. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer. The hotel also offers car hire. Greenbelt Mall is 1 mi from I'M Hotel, while Glorietta Mall is 1 mi away. Manila International Airport is 4.3 mi from the property.

description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at Melbourne Suites! To save at this property, all you have to do is  Located in Manila, 1.9 km from World Trade Center Metro Manila, Melbourne Suites has accommodations with a terrace and private parking. This 2-star hotel offers a concierge service. The property provides city views, a year-round outdoor pool, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available throughout the property. At the hotel, every room comes with a desk, a TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Some rooms here will provide you with a kitchenette with a microwave, a fridge and an oven. The nearest airport is Ninoy Aquino International Airport, 6.9 km from Melbourne Suites.

location: One Rizal Park, 0913 Manila, Philippines
description: Manila Hotel is a beautiful 5-star hotel located in Manila just 701 m from iconic Intramuros and 901 m from Manila Cathedral. The hotel provides free Wi-Fi access and facilities like in-house dining options, a business center and an outdoor swimming pool. Rooms are elegantly decorated and provide guests with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a seating area. Featuring a shower, the private bathrooms also come with a bath and a hairdryer. The suites have an ipod docking station, bathrooms fitted with Italian marble and a senso memory foam mattress. Some rooms offer views of Manila Bay, while other offer views of the city. The Red Jade Restaurant serves authentic Cantonese dishes, while The Champagne Room provides French delicacies. There is also Cafe Ilang-Ilang which serves Halal and international cuisines. Guests can also relax in The Tap Room Bar or in the lobby lounge. Alternatively, enjoy a refreshing drink by the Pool Bar. The hotel's deli services desserts and drinks throughout the day. Other facilities at the hotel include a fitness center and a spa. The spa offers a variety of massages. The hotel is located 901 m from Palacio del Gobernador, while Ninoy Aquino Airport is 6.5 mi away. The property offers free parking for guests' convenience.

location: 2 Resorts Drive, Pasay, 1309 Manila, Philippines
description: Marriott Manila Hotel offers luxurious accommodations across Terminal 3 of Ninoy Aquino International Airport. The hotel features an outdoor pool, a fitness center and 8 dining options. Marriott Manila Hotel is a 15-minute drive from Makati City and Bonifacio Global City Taguig. For guests who drive, On-site parking available, fee: is 60 PHP hourly. Spacious and air-conditioned, the elegant rooms are equipped with flat-screen TVs, a mini-bar and coffee/tea maker. 24-hour room service and free bottled water are provided. Guests can enjoy pampering massage treatments or simply relax in the hot tub at Marriott Manila Spa. The hotel also provides car rentals and laundry services. Marriott Cafe serves a buffet of international and local favorites. Other dining options include Cru Steakhouse, Man Ho and Gourmet Express.

location: 30th Street corner 5th Avenue, Bonifacio Global City, Taguig, 1634 Manila, Philippines
description: Right at the heart of Manila's lifestyle city in Taguig, Shangri-La The Fort, Manila -- Staycation Approved towers over Bonifacio Global City boasting of two outdoor swimming pool, several dining options, and free WiFi throughout the property. This 5-star hotel is within 260 m from the Mind Museum and 851 m from Bonifacio High Street. Features with luxuriously furnishing, all rooms at the hotel offer views of the city and are fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels, air conditioning, and a safety deposit box. Every room is equipped with a private bathroom with shower or bath facilities, slippers and free toiletries. At the hotel, guests can indulge on the daily buffet breakfast and different culinary experiences. The High Street Cafe and High Street Lounge features international selection and freshly baked pastries. The Canton Road serves authentic Chinese Cuisine and the Raging Bull Chophouse & Bar is a steakhouse that serves a la carte options while the Raging Bull Burgers offers American specialties. Samba delights guests with Peruvian cuisine. In-room dining may be arranged for guests. The outdoor swimming pool provides a relaxing urban setting for guests who simply wish to lounge and marvel on city views. The pool bar is open to serve drinks. Guests can workout at the on-site fitness center or make use of the sauna. Spa at Kerry Sports Manila can help guests relax and melt their stress away with Spa at Kerry Sports' signature massage. The Kid's Club is also available with extra cost. The 24-hour front desk can assist guests with services such as laundry, dry cleaning and luggage storage. Airport shuttle and car rental may be arranged for guests at an additional cost. The hotel's meeting/banquet facility may also be used at an extra charge. Glorietta Mall is 2.5 mi away while Greenbelt Mall is 2.5 mi from the hotel. The nearest airport is Manila International Airport, 4.5 mi from Shangri-La The Fort, Manila -- Staycation Approved.

hotel_name_: Holiday Inn & Suites Makati, an IHG Hotel
location: Glorietta Mall, Palm Drive, Ayala Center, Makati, 1224 Manila, Philippines
description: Directly connected to Glorietta Mall, Holiday Inn & Suites Makati offers a gym and a rooftop bar. This contemporary property is centrally located in Makati City, a 732 m walk to Greenbelt Mall and Ayala Museum. Offering free Wi-Fi, rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a personal refrigerator with mini-bar and a desk. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries and shower. A hairdryer, slippers and bathrobes are also provided. Guests can enjoy a swim at the outdoor swimming pool located at the rooftop. All-day dining options are available at Flavors Restaurant. Citron Bar serves Asian and Western dishes, while the rooftop bar and restaurant, Oz, serves a delicious Asian menu. The Holiday Inn & Suites Makati is within 3.1 mi from the Philippine International Convention Center and World Trade Center Manila. Ninoy Aquino Airport is 5 mi away. Free on-site parking is available.

description: Right on Manila Bay, a 30 minute drive from Ninoy Aquino International Airport, the 5-star Diamond Hotel Philippines features a spectacular free-form pool, tennis courts and a spa with reflexology treatments. The air-conditioned rooms are bright with large windows and spacious interiors. They have cable TV, a minibar and a sitting area with sofa set. Selected rooms offer great views of the bay. Luxurious massages and body treatments await guests at the spa. They can also work out at Diamond Hotelâ€™s well-equipped fitness center or relax at the outdoor hot tub. Enjoy views of a tropical grounds with delicate Japanese dishes at the award-winning Yurakuen Japanese Restaurant. Corniche Restaurant provides an international menu, while the Sky Lounge Music Bar offers a variety of beverages. Room service is available. The Diamond Philippines is a 10 minute drive from Luneta Park and a 20 minute drive from the Mall of Asia. Car rental facilities are available at the hotel.

To save at this property, all you have to do is  Nestled in the heart of the city, the Heritage Hotel Manila is within minutes from the international and domestic airports (NAIA). location: Corner of Ayala and Makati Avenues, 1226 , Makati, 1226 Manila, Philippines
description: You're eligible for a Genius discount at The Peninsula Manila! To save at this property, all you have to do is  Set in Manila within the central business district of Makati, 0.6 mi from Glorietta and 0.8 mi from Greenbelt Mall, The Peninsula Manila features of an outdoor swimming pool, 8 dining options, and a spa at the property. Free WiFi is also available throughout the hotel. Featuring views of the city, the rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen cable TV, and a safety deposit box. Other in-room amenities include a tea/coffee maker, a mini-bar, and an electric kettle. The private bathrooms include a hairdryer, a bath or a shower, and free toiletries while some rooms are fitted with a living and dining area. Escolta serves an international buffet, while Spices offers Asian cuisine with garden views. For afternoon tea and pastries, The Lobby is available. Enjoy fine dining at Old Manila, the hotel's signature restaurant wile elegant cocktails are served at Salon de Ning or The Bar. Deli sandwiches and chocolates are available at The Peninsula Boutique. The Pool Bar offers a refreshing outdoor dining experience while room service is also available. Guests can exercise in the gym, relax in the sauna, or make an appointment at the hair salon. Inspired by Oriental, Ayurvedic, and European practices, The Peninsula Spa features a serene setting for a much deserved urban relaxation. The hotel offers other facilities such as a gift shop and a kid's club. Airport shuttle services may be arranged for guests at an additional cost while the staff at the 24-hour front desk and concierge is willing to assist guests with any queries at any time of the day. There is an ATM and currency exchange at the property, as well as free parking. The Peninsula Manila is within 10-minute drive from Century City Mall while Power Plant Mall is 15-minute drive from the hotel. The nearest airport is Manila International Airport, 30-minute drive away from the hotel.

description: Centrally located in Malate, Sheraton Manila Bay showcases modern interiors with Filipino cultural and art displays. This 5-star hotel provides an outdoor pool, spa services and a 4-story shopping arcade. Rooms are fitted with free Wi-Fi and floor-to-ceiling windows with views of Manila Bay and City. All rooms come with a flat-screen TV, DVD player and over-sized work desk. The spacious bathroom has a small TV, a bathtub and a separate walk-in shower. Located in the Spanish Quarter of Manila Bay, Sheraton Manila Bay is a 5-minute walk from The Robinson's Place Mall and a 15-minute drive from The Mall of Asia. It is 5 mi from Ninoy Aquino International Airport. Free parking is available. Available 24 hours, personal butlers can help guests to arrange city tours, prepare a relaxing bubble bath or even confirm flights. Guests can also exercise at the gym or visit the on-site Adriatico Square shopping arcade. The top-floor Pacific Lounge serves international dishes and a daily buffet breakfast. Other dining options include the Lobby Lounge and Poolside Bar.

Signature cocktails and bar snacks can be enjoyed at The Deck Bar. Guests can make use of the fitness center and business center. Other facilities include a 24-hour front desk, safety deposit boxes and luggage storage. SM Southmall is 20-minute drive from the hotel, while Tagaytay is an hour drive away. The nearest airport is Manila Ninoy Aquino International Airport, 9.5 mi away.

description: Located in the heart of Makati Central Business District, this contemporary hotel is a convenient 3-minute walk to the famous Greenbelt Malls. A selection of international cuisine is served at the in-house restaurant. The E-Resto also offers room service.
